knimeNode.name: Database Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Permits downloading of Mascot databases (FASTA files)

fullDescription.intro: Downloads the chosen Mascot database (FASTA files) using MascotEE. Useful for obtaining or computing decoy sequences for estimation of false-discovery rate. Or just getting access to the sequence data which mascot uses for search.
fullDescription.option: The default is currently valid for plantcell.unimelb.edu.au users, however any url may be entered here where MascotEE has been installed. If you change the url, the available databases will automatically update but you can press the 'refresh' button as well.
Enter the database you would like to load
File to save data to (in addition to the output port)

ports.outPort: Sequences are loaded into this output port
